English: Iron Flamberge
French: Espadon en fer
German: Eisernes Großschwert
Spanish: Gran espada de Hierro
Russian: Железный длинный меч
Turkish: Demir Büyük Kılıç
Portuguese_Brazilian: Espada Grande de Ferro Pesado
Chinese: 铁质大剑
Japanese: Iron Flamberge

English: A wavy greatsword of death. The design is foreign, but quite effective.
French: Espadon ondulée. La conception est peu commune mais plutôt efficace.
German: Ein gewelltes Großschwert des Todes. Das Design ist fremd, aber sehr effektiv.
Spanish: Una espada ondulada de la muerte, su diseño es un poco extraño pero efectivo.
Russian: Двуручный меч с необычным волнистым лезвием, дизайн которого кажется не местным, но все равно является эффективным против врагов.
Turkish: Kavisli büyük bir ölüm kılıcı, tasarımı yabancı ama oldukça etkili.
Dutch: Een golvend langzwaard des doods, het ontwerp is vreemd maar zeer effectief.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma espada larga ondulada e mortal, a aparência é estranha, mas bastante eficaz.
Chinese: 一把波浪形的死亡大剑，设计很陌生但很有效。
Japanese: A wavy greatsword of death. The design is foreign, but quite effective.

English: Iron Zweihander
French: Lourde espadon en fer
German: Schweres Eisengroßschwert
Spanish: Gran espada de Hierro pesada
Russian: Железный тяжелый длинный меч
Turkish: Ağır Demir Büyük Kılıç
Portuguese_Brazilian: Espada Grande de Ferro Pesado
Chinese: 重铁大剑
Japanese: Iron Zweihander

English: A foreign weapon design that is heavier towards the end, and in general. Harder to swing, but devastatingly effective.
French: Une arme lourde de conception étrangère. Plus difficile à manier mais plus puissante qu'une espadon en fer classique.
German: Eine Waffe mit ausländischem Design, die gegen Ende und im Allgemeinen schwerer ist. Schwerer zu schwingen, aber stärker als ein normales Großschwert.
Spanish: Un diseño extranjero con el peso en la punta, dificil de blandir pero mas fuerte que su hermana pequeña.
Russian: Чужестранное оружее с ощутимым перевесом в лезвии. Им труднее размахивать, но тем не менее он сильнее, чем обычный длинный железный меч.
Turkish: Sonlara doğru ve genel olarak daha ağır olan başka bir yabancı tasarım. Savurması daha zor ama normal demir büyük kılıçtan daha güçlü.
Dutch: Een vreemd ontworpen wapen dat zwaarder is richting de punt. Het is moeilijker te zwaaien maar sterker dan een normaal langzwaard
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma arma de design estrangeiro, é mais pesada no final . Mais difícil de balançar, porém mais forte do que uma espada larga normal.
Chinese: 一种外来人设计的武器，在接近尾端时更重，一般来说。更难挥舞，但比普通的巨剑更强。
Japanese: A foreign weapon design that is heavier towards the end, and in general. Harder to swing, but devastatingly effective.
Korean: 끝으로 갈수록 무거워지는 검신은 휘두르기 어렵지만 일반 철 양손검보다 강합니다.

English: Silver Greatsword
French: Espadon en argent
German: Silbernes Großschwert
Spanish: Gran espada de Plata
Russian: Серебряный длинный меч
Turkish: Gümüş Büyük Kılıç
Portuguese_Brazilian: Espada Grande de Prata
Chinese: 银质大剑
Japanese: Silver Greatsword Ather

English: A large, ceremonial sword forged from pure silver, often carried by warrior nobility. Though not expressly made for combat, it has excellent range and the silver blade rends the undead apart.
French: Une espadon de cérémonie argentée. Les nobles guerriers ne choisiraient pas de renoncer à leur sécurité par choix. Cependant, la portée et sa lame argentée rendent cette arme idéale pour les hordes de morts-vivants.
German: Ein großes versilbertes Zeremonialschwert, edle Krieger würden ihre persönliche Sicherheit nicht freiwillig aufgeben. Die Reichweite und das Silber machen diese Waffe jedoch großartig für Horden von Untoten.
Spanish: Una larga espada ceremonial, normalmente los nobles no eligen un arma que los deje desprotegidos. En cualquier caso, el rango y el material hacen que esta arma sea buena para las hordas de los no-muertos.
Russian: Длинный церемониальный меч украшенный серебром, ни один благородный воин не отказался бы от своей безопасности, однако длинное лезвие и чистое серебро делают его отличным оружием против полчищ нежити.
Turkish: Büyük bir gümüş merasim kılıcı. Asil olan savaşçılar kişisel güvenliklerinden vazgeçmeyi tercih etmezler. Ancak menzili ve saf gümüşten olması onu ölümsüz ordular için harika bir tercih olarak kılıyor.
Dutch: Een groot verzilverd ceremonieel zwaard, adele krijgers zouden hun veiligheid niet vrijwillig opgeven. Evenals, het bereik en het zilver maken dit wapen geweldig tegen hordes ondonden.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma grande espada cerimonial de prata, os nobres guerreiros não escolheriam abrir mão de sua segurança pessoal. No entanto, o alcance e a prata tornam esta arma excelente para hordas de mortos-vivos.
Chinese: 一把超大的镀银仪式用剑，高贵的武者会用它捍卫自己的安全。 挥舞的范围和纯银材质对亡灵生物而言是致命的。
Japanese: A large, ceremonial sword forged from pure silver, often carried by warrior nobility. Though not expressly made for combat, it has excellent range and the silver blade rends the undead apart.
Korean: 은으로 도금된 의식용 검. 이검을 지닌 고귀한 전사들은 죽은자들과의 싸움을 주저하지 않습니다.

English: Great Silver Mace
French: Masse en argent
German: Großer Silberstreitkolben
Spanish: Gran mazo de Plata
Russian: Серебряная двуручная булава
Turkish: Büyük Gümüş Gürz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Excelente Maça de Prata
Chinese: 大银锤
Japanese: Great Silver Mace Ather

English: Forged with silver and enchanted, its dense metal and purifying bite cleaves through the undead. Further, its enchantments grant it the ability to freeze those that meet its bludgeoning head.
French: Forgé avec de l'argent et enchanté, le poids de sa tête contondante la rend idéal contre les morts-vivants. Les enchantements lui donnent la capacité de geler ceux qu'elle touche.
German: Mit Silber geschmiedet und verzaubert, macht es das Gewicht des Knüppelkopfes großartig gegen die Untoten. Die Verzauberungen geben ihm die Fähigkeit, diejenigen einzufrieren, die er trifft.
Spanish: Forjada y encantada con plata, su peso y material la convierte en un arma muy deseada para acabar con los no-muertos. Los encantamientos le otorgan el poder de congelar con cada golpe.
Russian: Зачарованная булава, выкованная из серебра, что делает её отличным оружием против нежити. Чары в свою очередь дают ей возможность замораживать пораженных врагов.
Turkish: Gümüşle dövülmüş ve büyülenmiş, gümüşün ağırlığı, arındırıcı metalden ve yoğunluktan onu ölümsüzlere karşı harika kılıyor. Büyüler ona çarptığını dondurma yeteneği sağlar.
Dutch: Gesmeed met zilver en betoverd, het gewicht van de knots maakt het gewldig tegen ondoden. De betoveringen geeft het de kracht degene die geraakt worden te bevriezen.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Forjado com prata e encantado, o peso da cabeça do golpe o torna grande contra os mortos-vivos. Os encantamentos dão a habilidade de congelar esses golpes.
Chinese: 用银锻造并附魔，银的重量使其从净化金属和密度上可以很好地对抗不死生物。 附魔使它能够冻结它击中的人。
Japanese: Forged with silver and enchanted, its dense metal and purifying bite cleaves through the undead. Further, its enchantments grant it the ability to freeze those that meet its bludgeoning head.
Korean: 은으로 단조되고 마법이 부여된 은 양손메이스는 교회의 이단심문관의 주무기입니다. 죽은자들에게 효과적입니다.

English: Silver Battleaxe
French: Hache en argent
German: Silberne Streitaxt
Spanish: Hacha de guerra de Plata
Russian: Серебряная секира
Turkish: Gümüş Savaş Baltası
Portuguese_Brazilian: Machado de Batalha de Prata
Chinese: 银色战斧
Japanese: Silver Battleaxe Ather

English: Purest of metals, this battleaxe is touched by the fury of the sky and cackles with electricity.  It's also pretty good at cutting trees.
French: Fabriquée à partir des métaux les plus purs, cette hache de combat est touchée par la fureur du ciel et la fait crépiter d'électricité.
German: Diese aus reinsten Metallen gefertigte Streitaxt wird von der Wut des Himmels berührt und lässt sie vor Elektrizität knistern. Es kann auch aufgrund von Sunder Trees machen.
Spanish: Forjada con el mas puro de los metales, esta hacha de batalla es tocada por la furia del cielo, haciéndola crepitar con la electricidad.
Russian: Боевой топор из чистейшего из металлов, наполненный яростью неба, заставляющей его излучать электрические разряды. Искры также могут появится и при рубке деревьев.
Turkish: Metallerin en safından olan bu savaş baltası, gökyüzünün gazabından etkilenir ve elektrikle kıvılcımlanır. Uzuvkoparan ağaçlar nedeniyle de yapabilir.
Dutch: Gemaakt van de puurste metalen, deze strijdbijl is geraakt door de furie van de lucht waardoor het knettert met elektriciteit. Het zal ook voldoen om bome te splijtsen.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Feito com o mais puro dos metais, este machado de batalha é tocado pela fúria do céu fazendo-o estalar com eletricidade. Também pode ocorrer devido a árvores rachadas.
Chinese: 最纯净的金属，这把战斧被天空的愤怒所触动，使其发出电流声。 它也可能因树木被破坏而产生。
Japanese: Purest of metals, this battleaxe is touched by the fury of the sky and cackles with electricity.  It's also pretty good at cutting trees.
Korean: 순수한 금속인 이 전투도끼는 하늘의 분노에 전율합니다.

English: Black Metal Greatsword
French: Espadon en sombracier
German: Schwarzmetall-Großschwert
Spanish: Gran espada de Metal Oscuro
Russian: Длинный меч из черного металла
Turkish: Karametal Büyük Kılıç
Portuguese_Brazilian: Espada de Metal Negro
Chinese: 黑金属大剑
Japanese: Black Metal Greatsword

English: A simple, yet crude great sword that shines with a beautiful emerald gleam.
French: Espadon simple et relativement grossierère, sa lame brille d'un vert émeraude lui donnant un bel éclat.
German: Ein einfaches und doch grobes Großschwert, dessen Klinge grün glänzt und ihm einen schönen Glanz verleiht.
Spanish: Un espadón algo tosco pero simple, la hoja brilla con un tenue verde dándole un hermoso brillo.
Russian: Большой и грубый меч с небольшим зеленым сиянием, которое придает ему прекрасные отблески.
Turkish: Basit ama yine de kaba bir büyük kılıç, yeşil parlıyor ve ona güzel bir parıltı veriyor.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma espada larga e simples, mas rude, sua lâmina brilha em verde, dando-lhe um belo brilho.
Chinese: 简单粗暴的大剑，闪烁着绿色的光芒，散发着美丽的光芒。
Japanese: A simple, yet crude great sword that shines with a beautiful emerald gleam.

English: Black Metal Battleaxe
French: Hache de combat en sombracier
German: Streitaxt aus schwarzem Metall
Spanish: Hacha de guerra de Metal Oscuro
Russian: Секира из черного металла
Turkish: Karametal Savaş Baltası
Portuguese_Brazilian: Machado de Batalha de Metal Negro
Chinese: 黑金属战斧
Japanese: Black Metal Battleaxe Ather

English: A heavy-headed battleaxe forged from dark metal with an emerald sheen.
French: Une hache de guerre lourde forgée à partir de sombracier et d'un éclat émeraude.
German: Eine schwere Streitaxt aus dunklem Metall mit smaragdgrünem Glanz.
Spanish: Un hacha de batalla pesada forjada en metal oscuro con un brillo verde esmeralda.
Russian: Тяжелый боевой топор, выкованный из темного металла и доведённый до изумрудного блеска.
Turkish: Zümrüt parlaklığına sahip karametalden dövülmüş ağır uçlu bir savaş baltası.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um machado de batalha de ponta pesada forjado em metal escuro com um brilho esmeralda.
Chinese: 一把重头战斧，由带有祖母绿光泽的深色金属锻造而成。
Japanese: A heavy-headed battleaxe forged from dark metal with an emerald sheen.
Korean: 녹색 빛을 띄는 흑철로 만든 튼튼한 전투도끼입니다.

English: Great Core Mace
French: Grande masse ardente
German: Großer Kernstreitkolben
Spanish: Gran mazo del Núcleo
Russian: Пламенная булава
Turkish: Büyük Çekirdekli Gürz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Grande Maça de Núcleo Surtling
Chinese: 大核心钉头锤
Japanese: Great Core Mace

English: An extremely heavy mace forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. Capable of smashing and incinerating with equal fury.
French: Une masse extrêmement lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant toujours de mille feux. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
German: Ein extrem schwerer Streitkolben aus dunklem Eisen und einem schillernden Kern, der immer noch hell leuchtet. Zerschmettere und verbrenne diejenigen, die sich dir widersetzen.
Spanish: Un mazo extremadamente pesado forjado con hierro oscuro y un núcleo de Surtling que aún brilla intensamente. Aplasta y quema a los que se oponen a ti.
Russian: Чрезвычайно тяжелая булава, созданная из черного железа и ядра суртлинга. Сокрушайте и сжигайте всех на своем пути.
Turkish: Koyu renk demirden yapılmış son derece ağır bir gürz ve Surtling özüyle ateşlenen dönen bir çekirdek. Size karşı olanları parçalayın ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma maça extremamente pesada feito de ferro negro e minério surtling que ainda brilha forte. Esmague e queime aqueles que se opõem a você.
Chinese: 一把由黑铁制成的极其沉重的狼牙棒和一个用苏特林精华点燃的苏林核心。 粉碎和烧毁那些反对你的人。
Japanese: An extremely heavy mace forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. Capable of smashing and incinerating with equal fury.
Korean: 흑철과 몬스터의 정수로 만들어진 양손 메이스 입니다. 당신에게 반하는 자를 부수고 불태우십시오.

English: Tarnished Great Core Mace
French: Grande masse ardente verte
German: Grüner Großkernstreitkolben
Spanish: Gran mazo del Núcleo Verde
Russian: Зеленая пламенная булава
Turkish: Yeşil Büyük Çekirdekli Gürz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Grande Maça de Núcleo Surtling Esverdeado
Chinese: 绿色大核狼牙棒
Japanese: Tarnished Great Core Mace

English: An extremely heavy mace made with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process must have somehow corrupted the core, resulting in an eerie green tinge, but no other special properties.
French: Une masse extrêmement lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant d'un vert étrange. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
German: Ein extrem schwerer Streitkolben aus dunklem Eisen und einem gruseligen Kern, der in einem unheimlichen Grün leuchtet. Zerschmettere und verbrenne diejenigen, die sich dir widersetzen.
Spanish: Un mazo extremadamente pesado forjado con hierro oscuro y un núcleo de Surtling que brilla con un verde espeluznante. Aplasta y quema a los que se oponen a ti.
Russian: Чрезвычайно тяжелая булава, созданная из черного железа и ядра суртлинга. Сокрушайте и сжигайте всех на своем пути. Имеет зеленое свечение.
Turkish: Koyu renk demirden yapılmış son derece ağır bir gürz ve Surtling özüyle ateşlenen dönen bir çekirdek. Size karşı olanları parçalayın ve yakın. Yeşile boyanmıştır.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma maça extremamente pesada feita de ferro negro e um minério surtling que brilha em um verde assustador. Esmague e queime aqueles que se opõem a você.
Chinese: 一把由黑铁制成的极其沉重的狼牙棒和一个用苏特林精华点燃的苏林核心。 粉碎和烧毁那些反对你的人。 它被染成绿色。
Japanese: An extremely heavy mace made with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process must have somehow corrupted the core, resulting in an eerie green tinge, but no other special properties.
Korean: 일반 코어 양손 메이스보다 더 강력한 메이스입니다. 당신에게 반하는 자를 부수고 불태우십시오.

English: Cold Great Core Mace
French: Grande masse ardente bleu
German: Blaue Große Kernkeule
Spanish: Gran mazo del Núcleo Azul
Russian: Синяя пламенная булава
Turkish: Mavi Büyük Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Grande Maça de Núcleo Surtling Frio
Chinese: 蓝色大核狼牙棒
Japanese: Cold Great Core Mace

English: An extremely heavy mace made with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process appears to have cooled the core, turning its flames an icy blue, but with no other special properties.
French: Une masse extrêmement lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant d'un bleu glacial. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
German: Eine extrem schwere Keule aus dunklem Eisen und einem Surtlingkern, der eisblau leuchtet. Zerschmettere und verbrenne diejenigen, die sich dir widersetzen.
Spanish: Un mazo extremadamente pesado forjado con hierro oscuro y un núcleo de Surtling que brilla con un azul congelante. Aplasta y quema a los que se oponen a ti.
Russian: Чрезвычайно тяжелая булава, созданная из черного железа и ядра суртлинга. Сокрушайте и сжигайте всех на своем пути. Имеет синее свечение.
Turkish: Kara metalden ve buz gibi mavi parlayan dalgalı bir çekirdekten yapılmış son derece ağır bir topuz. Karşınızda olanları ezin ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma maça extretamente pesada feita de ferro negro e um minerio de surtling que brilha um azul gélido. Esmague e congele aqueles que se opõem a você.
Chinese: 由黑铁制成的极其沉重的狼牙棒，其核心是发出冰蓝色的光芒。 粉碎和烧毁那些反对你的人。
Japanese: An extremely heavy mace made with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process appears to have cooled the core, turning its flames an icy blue, though with no other special properties.
Korean: 일반 코어 양손 메이스보다 더 강력한 메이스입니다. 당신에게 반하는 자를 부수고 불태우십시오.

English: Surt Core Mace
French: Masse ardente
Russian: Булава с сердцевиной Пылающего Серта
Turkish: Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Maça de Núcleo Surtling
Japanese: Surt Core Mace

English: A sturdy mace forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. Capable of smashing and incinerating with equal fury.
French: Une masse lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant toujours de mille feux. Écrasez et brûlez ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Прочная булава была забита темным железом и пылающим ядром. Можно разбить и навредить равной ярости.
Turkish: Kara metalden yapılmış ağır bir topuz ve hala parlak parıldayan dalgalı bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları ezin ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma maça robusta forjada com ferro negro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. Capaz de esmagar e incinerar com igual fúria.
Japanese: A sturdy mace forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. Capable of smashing and incinerating with equal fury.

English: Tarnished Surt Core Mace
French: Masse ardente verte
Russian: Потускневшая булава сурта
Turkish: Yeşil Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Maça de Núcleo Surtling Esverdeado
Japanese: Tarnished Surt Core Mace

English: A sturdy mace made with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process must have somehow corrupted the core, resulting in an eerie green tinge, but no other special properties.
French: Une masse lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant d'un vert étrange. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Крепкая булава, сделанная из темного железа и горящего ядра Сертлинга. Процесс ковки, должно быть, каким-то образом испортил ядро, что привело к жуткому зеленоватому оттенку, но никаких других особых свойств.
Turkish: Kara metalden yapılmış ağır bir topuz ve ürkütücü bir yeşillikle parlayan dalgalı bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları ezin ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma maça robusta feita com ferro negro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. O processo de forjamento deve ter corrompido o núcleo de alguma forma, resultando em uma estranha coloração verde, mas sem outras propriedades especiais.
Japanese: A sturdy mace made with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process must have somehow corrupted the core, resulting in an eerie green tinge, but no other special properties.

English: Cold Surt Core Mace
French: Masse ardente bleu
Russian: Булава с сердцевиной Холодного Серта
Turkish: Mavi Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Maça de Núcleo Surtling Frio
Japanese: Cold Surt Core Mace

English: A sturdy mace made with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process appears to have cooled the core, turning its flames an icy blue, but with no other special properties.
French: Une masse lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant d'un bleu glacial. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Крепкая булава, сделанная из темного железа и горящего ядра Сертлинга. Процесс ковки, по-видимому, охладил ядро, сделав его пламя ледяно-голубым, но без каких-либо других особых свойств.
Turkish: Kara metalden yapılmış ağır bir topuz ve ürkütücü bir mavilikle parlayan dalgalı bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları ezin ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma maça robusta feita com ferro negro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. O processo de forjamento parece ter esfriado o núcleo, transformando suas chamas em um azul gelado, mas sem outras propriedades especiais.
Japanese: A sturdy mace made with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process appears to have cooled the core, turning its flames an icy blue, though with no other special properties.

English: Great Core Battle Axe
French: Grande hache ardente
Russian: Большой боевой топор ядра
Turkish: Büyük Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Grande Machado de Batalha de Núcleo Surtling
Japanese: Great Core Battleaxe

English: An extremely heavy battleaxe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. It slices and sizzles with a tempestuous heat.
French: Une hache extrêmement lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant toujours de mille feux. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Чрезвычайно тяжелый боевой топор, выкованный из темного железа и горящего ядра Сертлинга. Он режется и шипит от бурного жара.
Turkish: Kara metalden demirden yapılmış, son derece ağır bir balta ve hala parlak parıldayan, dalgalanan bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları doğrayın ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um machado de batalha extremamente pesado forjado com ferro enegro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. Ele corta e chia com um calor tempestuoso.
Japanese: An extremely heavy battleaxe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. It slices and sizzles with a tempestuous heat.

English: Tarnished Great Core Battle Axe
French: Grande hache ardente verte
Russian: Потускневший боевой топор большого ядра
Turkish: Yeşil Büyük Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Grande Machado de Batalha de Núcleo Surtling Esverdeado
Japanese: Tarnished Great Core Battleaxe

English: An extremely heavy battleaxe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process must have somehow corrupted the core, resulting in an eerie green tinge, but no other special properties.
French: Une hache extrêmement lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant d'un vert étrange. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Чрезвычайно тяжелый боевой топор, выкованный из темного железа и горящего ядра Сертлинга. Процесс ковки, должно быть, каким-то образом испортил ядро, что привело к жуткому зеленоватому оттенку, но никаких других особых свойств.
Turkish: Kara metalden yapılmış, son derece ağır bir balta ve ürkütücü bir yeşillikle parlayan dalgalı bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları ezin ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um machado de batalha extremamente pesado forjado com ferro negro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. O processo de forjamento deve ter corrompido o núcleo de alguma forma, resultando em uma estranha coloração verde, mas sem outras propriedades especiais.
Japanese: An extremely heavy battleaxe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process must have somehow corrupted the core, resulting in an eerie green tinge, but no other special properties.

English: Cold Great Core Battle Axe
French: Grande hache ardente bleu
Russian: Боевой топор холодного ядра
Turkish: Mavi Büyük Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Grande Machado de Batalha de Núcleo Surtling Frio
Japanese: Cold Great Core Battleaxe

English: An extremely heavy battleaxe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process appears to have cooled the core, turning its flames an icy blue, but with no other special properties.
French: Une hache extrêmement lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant d'un bleu glacial. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Чрезвычайно тяжелый боевой топор, выкованный из темного железа и горящего ядра Сертлинга. Процесс ковки, по-видимому, охладил ядро, сделав его пламя ледяно-голубым, но без каких-либо других особых свойств.
Turkish: Kara metalden yapılmış, son derece ağır bir balta ve ürkütücü bir mavilikte parlayan dalgalı bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları ezin ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um machado de batalha extremamente pesado forjado com ferro negro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. O processo de forjamento parece ter esfriado o núcleo, transformando suas chamas em um azul gelado, mas sem outras propriedades especiais.
Japanese: An extremely heavy battleaxe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process appears to have cooled the core, turning its flames an icy blue, though with no other special properties.

English: Surt Core Axe
French: Hache ardente
Russian: Сердечный топор Сурта
Turkish: Çekirdekli Balta
Portuguese_Brazilian: Machado de Batalha de Núcleo Surtling
Japanese: Surt Core Axe

English: A sturdy axe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. It slices and sizzles with a tempestuous heat.
French: Une hache lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant toujours de mille feux. Écrasez et brûlez ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Крепкий топор, выкованный из темного железа и горящего ядра Сертлинга. Он режется и шипит от бурного жара.
Turkish: Kara metalden yapılmış ağır bir balta ve hala parıldayan dalgalı bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları doğrayın ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um machado robusto forjado com ferro negro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. Ele corta e chia com um calor tempestuoso.
Japanese: A sturdy axe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. It slices and sizzles with a tempestuous heat.

English: Tarnished Surt Core Axe
French: Hache ardente verte
Russian: Потускневший топор сурта
Turkish: Yeşil Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Machado de Batalha de Núcleo Surtling Esverdeado
Japanese: Tarnished Surt Core Axe

English: A sturdy axe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process must have somehow corrupted the core, resulting in an eerie green tinge, but no other special properties.
French: Une hache lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant d'un vert étrange. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Крепкий топор, выкованный из темного железа и горящего ядра Сертлинга. Процесс ковки, должно быть, каким-то образом испортил ядро, что привело к жуткому зеленоватому оттенку, но никаких других особых свойств.
Turkish: Kara metalden yapılmış ağır bir balta ve ürkütücü bir yeşillikte parlayan dalgalı bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları doğrayın ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um machado robusto forjado com ferro negro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. O processo de forjamento deve ter corrompido o núcleo de alguma forma, resultando em uma estranha coloração verde, mas sem outras propriedades especiais.
Japanese: A sturdy axe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process must have somehow corrupted the core, resulting in an eerie green tinge, but no other special properties.

English: Cold Surt Core Axe
French: Hache ardente bleu
Russian: Топор ядра холодного серта
Turkish: Mavi Çekirdekli Topuz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Machado de Batalha de Núcleo Surtling Frio
Japanese: Cold Surt Core Axe

English: A sturdy axe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process appears to have cooled the core, turning its flames an icy blue, but with no other special properties.
French: Une hache lourde conçue à partir de sombracier et d'un noyau de Surtling, brillant d'un bleu glacial. Écrasez et brûlez tous ceux qui s'opposent à vous.
Russian: Крепкий топор, выкованный из темного железа и горящего ядра Сертлинга. Процесс ковки, по-видимому, охладил ядро, сделав его пламя ледяно-голубым, но без каких-либо других особых свойств.
Turkish: Kara metalden yapılmış ağır bir balta ve ürkütücü bir mavilikle parlayan dalgalı bir çekirdeğe sahip. Size karşı olanları doğrayın ve yakın.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um machado robusto forjado com ferro negro e um núcleo de Surtling em chamas. O processo de forjamento parece ter esfriado o núcleo, transformando suas chamas em um azul gelado, mas sem outras propriedades especiais.
Japanese: A sturdy axe forged with dark iron and a burning Surtling core. The forging process appears to have cooled the core, turning its flames an icy blue, though with no other special properties.

English: Death Grip
French: Emprise de l'immortel
German: Griff des Unsterblichen
Spanish: Agarre del Inmortal
Russian: Хватка бессмертного
Turkish: Ölümsüz Kavrama
Portuguese_Brazilian: Alcance dos Imortais
Chinese: 不死之握
Japanese: Death Grip

English: Forged from the remains of a troll cursed with undeath, the severed arm clings tightly to its still-beating heart. The blood it pumps is fetid and rotten, rendering it highly toxic to the touch.
French: Le cœur d'un troll maudit par les morts-vivants, tenu par son bras tranché. Son coeur est alimenté par du sang toxique, le conservant dans un état de non-mort.
German: Das Herz eines vom Untod verfluchten Trolls, dessen abgetrennter Arm das immer noch schlagende Herz umfasst, das giftiges Blut pumpt, für immer in einem Zustand des Unsterblichen gefangen.
Spanish: El corazón de un troll maldecido con la no-muerte. Su brazo cercenado sostiene fuertemente el corazón que aún bombea sangre tóxica, atrapado eternamente en un estado inmortal.
Russian: Сердце тролля, проклятое на бессмертие, её отрубленная рука будет вечно сжимать все еще бьющееся сердце, которое до сих пор качает ядовитую кровь.
Turkish: Ölümle lanetlenmiş bir trolün kalbi, kopmuş kolu zehirli kan pompalayan ve sonsuza dek ölümsüz bir durumda kapana kısılmış, hala atan kalbi kavradı.
Portuguese_Brazilian: O coração de um troll amaldiçoado com mortos-vivos, seu braço decepado agarrando o coração ainda batendo que bombeia sangue tóxico, para sempre preso em um estado de imortalidade.
Chinese: 巨魔的心脏被亡灵诅咒，它被切断的手臂抓住了仍在跳动的心脏，泵出有毒血液，永远被困在不死的状态中。
Japanese: Forged from the remains of a troll cursed with undeath, the severed arm clings tightly to its still-beating heart. The blood it pumps is fetid and rotten, rendering it highly toxic to the touch.
Korean: 언데드의 저주를 받은 트롤의 심장, 잘려진 팔이 유독 피를 뿜어내고 여전히 고동치는 심장을 움켜쥐고 영원히 불사 상태에 갇힙니다.

English: Moder's Sorrow
French: Le chagrin de Moder
German: Mutters Kummer
Spanish: Lamento de Moder
Russian: Скорбь Матери
Turkish: Moder'in Kederi
Portuguese_Brazilian: Tristeza de Moder
Chinese: 现代人的悲哀
Japanese: Moder's Sorrow

English: The lamentable misery of the Mother of Dragons, cast in obsidian and made manifest in the breath of the mountains. Her bite can freeze the very souls of her foes.
French: L'affliction de Moder rendu tangible au travers d'une lame massive, conçue à partir d'obsidienne et insufflé du blizzard des montagnes. Ceux qui manient cette épé peuvent geler l'âme de ceux qu'ils frappent.
German: Mutters Kummer wurde durch Obsidian und den Hauch der Berge in einer massiven Klinge greifbar. Diejenigen, die dies ausüben, können die Seelen derer, die sie treffen, einfrieren.
Spanish: El lamento de Moder se hizo tangible a través de una cuchilla hecha con la obsidiana y el frío aliento de la montaña. Se dice que su golpe puede congelar el alma de sus rivales al impacto.
Russian: В этом огромном обсидиановом мече ощущается дыхание гор и огромная скорбь Матери по ее детям. Его холод может заморозить даже самые сильные души.
Turkish: Moder'in Kederi obsidiyen ve dağların nefesiyle somutlaştırıldı. Bunu kullananlar, vurdukları kişilerin ruhlarını dondurabilir.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A tristeza de Moder se tornou tangível em uma lâmina enorme através da obsidiana e a respiração das montanhas. Aqueles que o empunham podem congelar as próprias almas de quem eles atingem.
Chinese: 现代人的悲痛之大，透过黑曜石和山间的气息，变得有形。 那些使用它的人可以冻结他们击中的人的灵魂。
Japanese: The lamentable misery of the Mother of Dragons, cast in obsidian and made manifest in the breath of the mountains. Her bite can freeze the very souls of her foes.
Korean: 모더의 슬픔 그것의 위대함은 흑요석과 산의 숨결을 통해 구체화되었습니다. 이것을 다루는자는 상대의 영혼을 얼어붙게 할 수 있습니다.

English: Moder's Rage
French: Le chagrin écarlate de Moder
Spanish: Lamento de Moder Rojo
Russian: Кровавая скорбь Модера
Turkish: Kızıl Moder'in Hüznü
Portuguese_Brazilian: Tristeza de Moder Avermelhada
Chinese: 红色莫德的悲伤
Japanese: Moder's Rage

English: The endless hatred of the Mother of Dragons, cast in obsidian and made manifest in the breath of the mountains. Her bite can freeze the very souls of her foes.
French: L'affliction et le tourment de Moder rendu tangible au travers d'une lame massive, conçue à partir d'obsidienne et insufflé du blizzard des montagnes. Ceux qui manient cette épé peuvent geler l'âme de ceux qu'ils frappent. Une étrange aura écarlate s'en dégage.
Spanish: El lamento de Moder se hizo tangible a través de una cuchilla hecha con la obsidiana y el frío aliento de la montaña. Se dice que su golpe puede congelar el alma de sus rivales al impacto. Esta hoja brilla en rojo comparado con su forma base.
Russian: В этом огромном обсидиановом мече ощущается дыхание гор и огромная скорбь Матери по ее детям. Его холод может заморозить даже самые сильные души. Отдает красным оттенком.
Turkish: Moder'in hüznü, obsidiyen ve dağların nefesi aracılığıyla devasa bir bıçakta somutlaştırıldı. Bunu kullananlar, vurduğu kişilerin ruhlarını dondurabilirler. Temel formuna kıyasla kırmızı renkte parlıyor.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A tristeza de Moder se tornou tangível em uma lâmina enorme através da obsidiana e a respiração das montanhas. Aqueles que o empunham podem congelar as próprias almas de quem eles atingem. Ela brilha em vermelho de sangue em comparação com sua forma de base.
Chinese: 莫德的悲伤通过黑曜石和山脉的呼吸在巨大的刀刃上变得有形。那些使用它的人可以融化他们击中人的灵魂。与其基本形态相比，它发出红色光。
Japanese: The endless hatred of the Mother of Dragons, cast in obsidian and made manifest in the breath of the mountains. Her bite can freeze the very souls of her foes.
Korean: 모데르의 슬픔은 흑요석과 산의 숨결을 통해 거대한 칼날에 실체를 드러냈습니다. 이것을 휘두르는 자들은 그들이 때린 자들의 영혼을 얼어붙게 할 수 있습니다. 이것은 기본 형태에 비해 빨간색으로 빛납니다.

English: Flametal Zweihander
French: Espadon en métal stéllaire
German: Flametall Großschwert
Spanish: Gran espada de Flametal
Russian: Огненный длинный меч
Turkish: Oddemir Büyük Kılıç
Portuguese_Brazilian: Grande Espada de Lumetal
Chinese: 烈焰巨剑
Japanese: Flametal Greatsword Ather

English: Crafted of flametal from the Ashlands, the fire dancing about its blade sizzles with an unnatural vigor. Cuts from this burn the body and scorch the soul alike.
French: Cette lame est fabriquée à partir d'un métal flamboyant des Terres de Feu. Les flammes dansent sur la lame et crépitent d'une vigueur surnaturelle. Ceux qui manient cet espadon peuvent bruler l'âme et le corps de ses ennemis.
German: Diese Klinge ist aus Flammental aus den Ashlands gefertigt, und die Flammen, die aus ihrer Klinge tanzen, zischen mit einer unnatürlichen Kraft. Schnitte damit würden Seele und Körper gleichermaßen versengen.
Spanish: Esta hoja esta creada con un metal llameante de las Tierras de Ceniza. Las llamas danzan por la hoja mientras se elevan con una fuerza antinatural. Sus golpes quem el cuerpo y alma por igual.
Russian: Этот клинок изготовлен из огнеметалла добытого в пепельных землях, пламя танцующее на его лезвии, шипит неестественной силой. Порезы сделанные им, смогут опалить и душу, и тело.
Turkish: Bu bıçak, Kül Toprakları'ndan gelen alev metalinden yapılmıştır, kılıcından çıkan alevler doğal olmayan bir güçle cızırdamaktadır. Bununla yapılan kesikler hem ruhu hem de bedeni kavurur.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Esta lâmina é feita de Lumetal das Ashlands, as chamas dançando de sua lâmina chiam com um vigor sobrenatural. Cortes com isso queimariam tanto a alma quanto o corpo.
Chinese: 这把刀刃由灰烬之地的火焰制成，刀刃上舞动的火焰带着不自然的活力发出嘶嘶声。 用这个切割会烧焦灵魂和身体。
Japanese: Crafted of flametal from the Ashlands, the fire dancing about its blade sizzles with an unnatural vigor. Cuts from this burn the body and scorch the soul alike.
Korean: 이그나이트의 검신안에서는 불꽃이 춤추고있으며 이는 상대의 영혼과 몸을 불태웁니다.

English: Dragon Slayer
French: Tueur de dragon
German: Dragon Slayer
Spanish: Matadragones
Russian: Убийца Драконов
Turkish: Ejderha Avcısı
Portuguese_Brazilian: Matador de Dragões
Chinese: 屠龙者
Japanese: Dragon Slayer

English: It was too big to be called a sword. Massive, thick, heavy, and far too rough. Indeed, it was like a heap of raw iron. The blacksmith Godot forged this under orders to create something that could slay a dragon. It can be best described as a sharp maul, rather than a sword.   —In Memory of Kentarou Miura—
French: Bien trop grosse pour être considérée comme une simple épée. Massive, épaisse, lourde et très rugueuse, il ne s'agissait qu'à l'origine, d'un tas de fer brut. Le forgeron Godot l'a façonné de manière à créer de quoi tuer un dragon. Il s'agirait finalement plutôt d'une masse tranchante, qu'un espadon.
German: Es war zu groß, um als Schwert bezeichnet zu werden. Massiv, dick, schwer und viel zu rau. Tatsächlich war es ein Haufen Roheisen. Der Schmied Godot schmiedete dies unter dem Befehl, etwas zu schaffen, das einen Drachen töten könnte. "Es kann am besten als scharfes Hack und nicht als Schwert beschrieben werden. In Memory of Kentarou Miura, 11.07.1966 bis 06.05.2021 . Möge dein Andenken und dein Vermächtnis weiterleben."
Spanish: Era demasiado grande para ser llamada espada. Enorme, gruesa, pesada y demasiado tosca, de hecho era un montón de metal en bruto. El herrero Godot forjó esto bajo las ordenes de crear algo que pudiera "Matar a un Dragón". Es mas fácil describirla como un mazo afilado que como una espada. (En memoria de Kentarou Miura, 11-07-1966 a 06-05-2021. Que tu memoria y tu legado sigan vivos.)
Russian: Он слишком огромен, чтобы называться мечем. Массивный, толстый, тяжелый и слишком грубый. Фактически, он был кучей сырого железа. Кузнец Годот выковал его по приказу создать нечто, что способно убить дракона. Лучше называть его острой булавой, чем мечом. В память о Кентаро Миюра, 11.07.1966 - 06.05.2021. Пусть память о тебе будет жить всегда.
Turkish: Kılıç denilemeyecek kadar büyük. Devasa, kalın, ağır ve fazlasıyla kaba. Gerçekten de, bir ham demir yığını. Bir ejderhayı öldürebilecek bir şey yaratma fikri ile dövüldü.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Era muito grande para ser chamado de espada. Enorme, espesso, pesado e muito áspero. Na verdade, era um monte de ferro bruto. O ferreiro Godot forjou isso sob a ordem de criar algo que pudesse matar um dragão ". Pode ser melhor descrito como um maul afiado, em vez de uma espada. Em Memória de Kentarou Miura.
Chinese: “它太大了，不能称为剑。又大又厚又重，而且太粗糙了。确实，它是一堆生铁。铁匠戈多为了制造可以“杀死龙”的东西而锻造了它 . 最好将它描述为一把锋利的槌子，而不是一把剑。纪念三浦健太郎，11-07-1966 至 06-05-2021。愿你的记忆和你的遗产永存。”
Japanese: It was too big to be called a sword. Massive, thick, heavy, and far too rough. Indeed, it was like a heap of raw iron. The blacksmith Godot forged this under orders to create something that could slay a dragon. It can be best described as a sharp maul, rather than a sword.   —In Memory of Kentarou Miura—
Korean: 이 거대한 검신은 용의 목을 베어내기에 적합합니다.

English: Undying Devotion
French: Corps des dévoués
German: Körper des Ergebenen
Spanish: Cuerpo del Devoto
Russian: Тело преданных
Turkish: Adanmışların Bedeni
Portuguese_Brazilian: Devoto dos Corpos
Chinese: 虔诚者的身体
Japanese: Undying Devotion

English: A macabre weapon formed from the twisted bones of those devoted to the dark art of necromancy. They now live forever after sacrificing their own bodies to reach that eternal state of undying they worshipped so intently. Virtually indestructible, its wielder saps energy from the foes it has slain, much like a lich.
French: Les os tordus de ceux qui se consacrent à l'idéologie de l'Immortel. Sacrifiant leur propre corps pour créer cette arme, afin d'atteindre l'état d'immortalité qu'ils vénéraient si intensément. Elle semble être indestructible, guérissant même lentement son porteur.
German: Die verdrehten Knochen derer, die sich der Ideologie der Unsterblichen verschrieben haben und ihre eigenen Körper opferten, um diese Waffe zu erschaffen, um den Zustand der Unsterblichkeit zu erreichen, den sie so intensiv verehrten. Es scheint unzerstörbar zu sein und heilt den Träger sogar langsam.
Spanish: Los huesos retorcidos de los devotos a la ideología de la Inmortalidad. Sacrificando sus propios cuerpos, los devotos crearon esta arma para alcanzar el estado de inmortalidad que tanto anhelaban. Parece ser indestructible, incluso curando al portador lentamente.
Russian: Искореженные кости тех, кто предан идеологии бессмертия, жертвуя своими телами, чтобы создать это оружие и достичь состояния бессмертия, к которому они так усердно стремились. Он кажется неразрушимым и даже медленно исцелет владельца.
Turkish: Ölümsüzler ideolojisine gönül verenlerin, bu silahı yaratmak için kendi bedenlerini feda edenlerin, bu kadar içtenlikle taptıkları ölümsüzlük durumuna ulaşmak için bükülmüş kemikleri. Yok edilemez gibi görünüyor, hatta sahibini yavaş yavaş iyileştiriyor.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Os ossos retorcidos daqueles devotados à ideologia dos Imortais, sacrificando seus próprios corpos para criar essa arma a fim de alcançar o estado de imortalidade que eles adoravam tão intensamente. Parece ser indestrutível, mesmo curando o portador lentamente.
Chinese: 那些致力于不朽意识的邪恶骷髅，牺牲自己的意识形态来制造这种武器，以达到他们唯一崇拜的不朽状态。它似乎是坚不可摧的，甚至慢慢地治愈持用者。
Japanese: A macabre weapon formed from the twisted bones of those devoted to the dark art of necromancy. They now live forever after sacrificing their own bodies to reach that eternal state of undying they worshipped so intently. Virtually indestructible, its wielder saps energy from the foes it has slain, much like a lich.
Korean: 뒤틀린 뼈는 그들이 열렬히 숭배했던 불멸의 상태에 도달하기 위해 이 무기를 만들기 위해 그들 자신의 몸을 희생하는 것이다. 장착 치유 효과

English: Black Metal Flamberge
French: Espadon exotique en sombracier
German: Exotisches Schwarzmetall-Großschwert
Spanish: Gran espada de Metal Oscuro
Russian: Чужеземный меч из черного металла
Turkish: Karametal Büyük Kılıç Yabancı
Portuguese_Brazilian: Grande Espada Exótica de Metal Negro
Chinese: 奇异的的黑金巨剑
Japanese: Black Metal Flamberge

English: A wavy great sword of death. The design is foreign, but quite effective. Its blade shines a lustrous green.
French: Espadon ondulée. La conception est peu commune mais plutôt efficace. Sa lame luit d'un bel éclat vert.
German: Ein gewelltes großes Todesschwert, das Design ist fremd, aber sehr effektiv.
Spanish: Una espada ondulada de la muerte, su diseño es un poco extraño pero efectivo. La hoja brilla con un verde inteso.
Russian: Двуручный меч с необычным волнистым лезвием, дизайн которого кажется не местным, но все равно является эффективным против врагов.
Turkish: Dalgalı büyük bir ölüm kılıcı, tasarım yabancı ama oldukça etkili.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma grande espada de forma ondulante, a forma é estranha, mas bastante eficaz e mortal.
Chinese: 这是一把波浪形的死亡之剑，设计别具一格，但相当有效。
Japanese: A wavy great sword of death. The design is foreign, but quite effective. Its blade shines a lustrous green.
Korean: 물결치는 죽음의 대검인 그 디자인은 이국적이지만 꽤 효과적이다. 그 칼날은 초록색으로 빛나 아름다운 빛을 낸다.

English: Buck & Doe
French: Cerf et Biche
German: Buck 'n Doe
Spanish: Buck and Doe
Russian: Кастет из рогов Эйктюра
Turkish: Antilop ve Karaca
Portuguese_Brazilian: Buck e Doe
Chinese: Buck 和 Doe
Japanese: Buck & Doe

English: Leather knuckle wraps with Eikthyr's antlers strapped to the right hand. Named in honour of the kin of the god of the forest; Buck for the right hand and Doe for the left. Their unsual power grants the wielder the swiftness of the forest's denizens.
French: Un ensemble de gantelets fixé avec des bois d'Eikthyr et attachés par des pièces de cuir à la main droite. Lorsqu'elles sont équipées dans les deux mains, elles portent ainsi le nom de Cerf et Biche. Elle semble être habité d'un pouvoir inhabituel.
German: Knöchelbandagen aus Leder mit Eikthyr-Geweih an der rechten Hand, die den Namen Buck 'n Doe für die rechte und linke Bandage tragen. Es scheint eine ungewöhnliche Kraft zu haben.
Spanish: Nudillos de cuero unidos a las astas de Eikthyr atadas a la mano derecha, con el nombre de Buck and Doe en referencia a cada mano, parece tener un poder inusual.
Russian: Кожаные перчатки с рогами, привязанными к правой руке, из-за чего называются Олень и Олениха. Кажется, они обладают необычной силой.
Turkish: Sağ ele sarılı Eikthyr boynuzları ile deri mafsal sargıları, sağ ve sol sargılardan dolayı Antilop ve Karaca adını alır. Alışılmadık bir güce sahip gibi görünüyor.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Punhos de couro com chifres de Eikthyr amarrados à mão direita, dando o nome de Buck e Doe para os punhos direito e esquerdo. Parece ter um poder incomum.
Chinese: 皮革绑在右手指关节上包裹着Eikthyr的鹿角，浮现出Buck和Doe的名字。它似乎有一种不同寻常的力量。
Japanese: Leather knuckle wraps with Eikthyr's antlers strapped to the right hand. Named in honour of the kin of the god of the forest; Buck for the right hand and Doe for the left. Their unsual power grants the wielder the swiftness of the forest's denizens.
Korean: 가죽 손가락 마디가 에이크티르의 뿔로 오른손에 감겨 오른쪽과 왼쪽을 감쌀 때 벅과 도라는 이름을 붙인다. 그것은 특이한 힘을 가지고 있는 것 같다.

English: Bronze Knuckles
French: Griffe en bronze
German: Bronzeknöchel
Spanish: Nudillos de Bronce
Russian: Бронзовый кастет
Turkish: Bronz Muşta
Portuguese_Brazilian: Manoplas de Bronze
Chinese: 青铜手套
Japanese: Bronze Knuckles

English: A set of knuckle wraps fixed with bronze that not only protect the user's hands, but also inflict more damage with each strike.
French: Un ensemble de gantelets fixés avec du bronze. Protège les mains de l'utilisateur, mais permet également d'infliger plus de dégâts à ses ennemis.
German: Ein Set mit bronzenen Panzerhandschuhen, die nicht nur die Hände des Benutzers schützen, sondern auch den getroffenen Personen mehr Schaden zufügen.
Spanish: Un conjunto de guantes fijados con bronce que no solo sirven para proteger las manos del portador, sino también para inflingir más daño a quienes golpea.
Russian: Набор перчаток, с прикрепленной бронзой, чтобы не только защитить руки пользователя, но и помочь нанести больший урон тем, кого они поражают.
Turkish: Sadece kullanıcının ellerini korumakla kalmayıp aynı zamanda vurduğu kişilere daha fazla hasar vermesine yardımcı olmak için bronzla sabitlenmiş bir dizi eldiven.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um conjunto de manoplas fixadas com bronze para não apenas proteger as mãos do usuário, mas também para ajudar a infligir mais danos àqueles que atingirem.
Chinese: 一副用青铜制作的护手套，不仅可以保护你的双手，还可以帮助你击败敌人。
Japanese: A set of knuckle wraps fixed with bronze that not only protect the user's hands, but also inflict more damage with each strike.

English: Iron Knuckles
French: Griffe en fer
German: Eiserne Knöchel
Spanish: Nudillos de Hierro
Russian: Железный кастет
Turkish: Demir Muşta
Portuguese_Brazilian: Manoplas de Ferro
Chinese: 铁手套
Japanese: Iron Knuckles

English: A sturdy set of gauntlets studded with iron plates, granting great weight and force to each swing. Inflicts heavy damage with each strike.
French: Un ensemble de gantelets fixé avec du fer. Protège les mains de l'utilisateur, mais permet également d'infliger plus de dégâts à ses ennemis.
German: Ein Satz mit Eisen befestigter Stulpen, die nicht nur die Hände des Benutzers schützen, sondern auch den getroffenen Personen mehr Schaden zufügen.
Spanish: Un conjunto de guantes fijados con hierro que no solo sirven para proteger las manos del portador, sino también para inflingir más daño a quienes golpea.
Russian: Набор перчаток, с прикрепленным железом, чтобы не только защитить руки пользователя, но и помочь нанести больший урон тем, кого они поражают.
Turkish: Sadece kullanıcının ellerini korumakla kalmayıp aynı zamanda vurduğu kişilere daha fazla hasar vermesine yardımcı olmak için demirle sabitlenmiş bir dizi eldiven.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um conjunto de manoplas fixadas com ferro não apenas para proteger as mãos do usuário, mas também para ajudar a infligir mais danos àqueles que atingirem.
Chinese: 一副用铁制作的护手套，不仅可以保护你的双手，还可以帮助你击败敌人。
Japanese: A sturdy set of gauntlets studded with iron plates, granting great weight and force to each swing. Inflicts heavy damage with each strike.

English: Silver Claws
French: Griffe en argent
Spanish: Colmillos de Plata
Russian: Серебряные когти
Turkish: Gümüş Pençeler
Portuguese_Brazilian: Garras de Prata
Japanese: Silver Claws

English: A pair of iron gauntlets, padded with wolf hide and bristling with a set of glistening silver blades. Shreds apart flesh, living or dead alike.
French: Un ensemble de gantelets fixés avec de l'argent. Protège les mains de l'utilisateur, mais permet également d'infliger plus de dégâts à ses ennemis.
Spanish: Un par de guantes de lobo con hojas dobles hechas de plata. Excelentes para triturar carne, viva o no-muerta.
Russian: Пара перчаток в виде лап волка с серебряными лезвиями, прекрасно подходит для разрезания плоти, живой или мертвой
Turkish: Canlı veya ölümsüz, eti parçalamak için harika, çift gümüş bıçaklı bir demir kurt eldiveni.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um par de manoplas de lobo de ferro com lâminas duplas prateadas, ótimas para retalhar carne, viva ou morta-viva.
Japanese: A pair of iron gauntlets, padded with wolf hide and bristling with a set of glistening silver blades. Shreds apart flesh, living or dead alike.

English: Bronze Crowbill
French: Bec-de-pie
Spanish: Bec de Corbin de Bronce
Russian: Бронзовый вороний клюв
Turkish: Bronz Karga Gagası
Portuguese_Brazilian: Machadinha Multi Tarefas de Bronze
Japanese: Bronze Crowbill

English: A clever fusion of hammer and pick, to pummel and pierce with equal ease.
French: L'assemblage d'un marteau et d'une pioche. Ce marteau-piolet en bronze peut être utilisé pour percer ou frapper des cibles.
Spanish: Una fusión de un martillo y un pico, puede ser usado para atravesar o golpear objetivos.
Russian: Смесь молота и кирки, которую можно использовать для пробития или оглушения врагов.
Turkish: Çekiç ve kazma karışımı olan bu bronz karga gagası, hedefleri delmek ve onlara vurmak için kullanılabilir.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma mistura de um martelo e uma picareta,está ferramenta de bronze pode ser usado para perfurar, esmagar e cortas alvos.
Japanese: A clever fusion of hammer and pick, to pummel and pierce with equal ease.

English: Bronze Khopesh
French: Espadon en bronze
Spanish: Gran espada de Bronce
Russian: Бронзовый длинный меч
Turkish: Bronz Büyük Kılıç
Portuguese_Brazilian: Khopesh de Bronze
Japanese: Bronze Khopesh

English: A greatsword with a uniquely curved blade, inspired by the weapons of warriors from an extremely arid land.
French: Une épée à deux mains d'une conception unique, dont on dit qu'elle s'inspire des épées de guerriers d'une terre extrêmement aride.
Spanish: Un espadón con diseño único, se dice que está inspirada en las espadas de los guerreros provenientes de tierras extremandamente áridas.
Russian: Длинный меч с уникальным дизайном, воодушевленный мечами войнов из чрезвычайно засушливых регионов.
Turkish: Son derece kurak bir ülkeden gelen savaşçıların kılıçlarından ilham aldığı söylenen, benzersiz bir şekilde tasarlanmış harika bir kılıç.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Uma espada larga com um design único, que se diz ter sido inspirada nas espadas dos guerreiros de uma terra extremamente árida.
Japanese: A greatsword with a uniquely curved blade, inspired by the weapons of warriors from an extremely arid land.

English: Bronze Battleaxe
French: Hache de guerre en bronze
Spanish: Hacha de guerra de Bronce
Russian: Бронзовая секира
Turkish: Bronz Savaş Baltası
Portuguese_Brazilian: Machado de Batalha de Bronze
Japanese: Bronze Battleaxe Ather

English: A hefty battleaxe with a head of burnished bronze. Makes light work of felling foes or forests.
French: Une hache de combat en bronze. Idéale pour fendre des groupes d'ennemis. Peut être utilisé pour couper du bois en un rien de temps.
Spanish: Un hacha de guerra de bronce, buena para limpiar grupos de enemigos enteros. Puede usarse para cortar madera en un parpadeo.
Russian: Бронзовый двуручный топор, который идеально подходит для рубки полчищ врагов. В крайнем случае можно использовать для колки дров.
Turkish: Düşman gruplarını parçalamak için harika bir bronz savaş baltası. Bir tutam odun kesmek için de kullanılabilir.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um machado de batalha de bronze, ótimo para dividir grupos de inimigos. Pode ser usado para cortar lenha.
Japanese: A hefty battleaxe with a head of burnished bronze. Makes light work of felling foes or forests.

English: Bronze Sledge
French: Luge en bronze
Spanish: Almádena de Bronce
Russian: Бронзовый молот
Turkish: Bronz Balyoz
Portuguese_Brazilian: Marreta de Bronze
Japanese: Bronze Sledge Ather

English: A massive heap of blunt bronze on a stick. Its weight alone yields crushing force.
French: Un gros morceau de bronze avec lequel il sera bon d'arpenter les sommets enneigés.
Spanish: Un gran trozo de bronce que es muy bueno para aporrear cosas.
Russian: Большой кусок бронзы, которым очень удобно колотить различне вещи.
Turkish: Bir şeyleri ezmek için harika bir büyük bronz balyoz.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Um grande pedaço de bronze que será ótimo esmagar ossos e outras coisas.
Japanese: A massive heap of blunt bronze on a stick. Its weight alone yields crushing force.

English: Boar Berserker Headdress
The severed head of a great boar, worn as a headdress.
Boar Berserker Chest
A leather armband with tusks secured to it along with a leather shoulder guard also adorned with tusks.
Boar Berserker Skirt
A thick skirt made with leather paired with form fitting leather boots.
Boar Berserker Scarf
Two pieces of leather make up this scarf, secured together with a pin made from a boar tusk.
